Summary: Biochemical reaction from 5-hydroxyindole-3-acetaldehyde to 5-hydroxyindole-3-acetic acid. This interaction can be catalyzed by ALDH2 or ALDH1A1.
Biochemical reaction from 5-hydroxytryptophol to 5-hydroxytryptophol sulfate. This interaction is catalyzed by SULT1A1.
Biochemical reaction from serotonin to 5-hydroxyindole-3-acetaldehyde. This interaction can be catalyzed by MAOA or MAOB.
Biochemical reaction from 5-hydroxyindole-3-acetaldehyde to 5-hydroxytryptophol. This interaction is catalyzed by ADH1B.
Biochemical reaction from l-tryptophan to 5-hydroxy-L-tryptophan. This interaction is catalyzed by TPH2.
Biochemical reaction from 5-hydroxytryptophol to 5-hydroxytryptophol glucuronide. This interaction is catalyzed by UGT1A6.
Biochemical reaction from 5-hydroxy-L-tryptophan to serotonin. This interaction is catalyzed by DDC.
